title: Can Anybody please suggest me the EXACT font used in this logo?
author: ddpaladiya

comments.content: Originally a photolettering font for VGC called Bisque, Corel bundled a digital version they called [Brisk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414114303/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/cdrfonts/Brisk_C.pdf) with some of its programs.
